member.name: IWICPlanarFormatConverter.CanConvert
member.summary: Query if the format converter can convert from one format to another.
member.param: An array of WIC pixel formats that represents source image planes.
The number of source pixel formats specified by the pSrcFormats parameter.
True if the conversion is supported.

returns.para: If the conversion is not supported, this method returns S_OK, but *pfCanConvert is set to FALSE.
If this method fails, the out parameter pfCanConvert is invalid.

member.param: An array of that represents image planes.
The number of component planes specified by the planes parameter.
The palette to use for conversion.
The alpha threshold to use for conversion.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
